trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A KeyPressEventArgs specifies the character that is composed when the user presses a key.
trans-unit.target: En KeyPressEventArgs angir tegnet som er opprettet ved å trykke en nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: For example, when the user presses SHIFT + K, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property returns an uppercase K. A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event occurs when the user presses a key.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel ved å trykke SKIFT + K, returnerer egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>en store kB. En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>inntreffer når brukeren trykker en nøkkel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Two events that are closely related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.
trans-unit.target: To hendelser nært relaterte til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>hendelsen er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event precedes each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event when the user presses a key, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event occurs when the user releases a key.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>hendelsen kommer før hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>hendelsen ved å trykke en nøkkel og et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>hendelsen oppstår når brukeren slipper en nøkkel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: When the user holds down a key, duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> events occur each time the character repeats.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren holder ned en nøkkel, dupliserte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>hendelser inntreffer hver gang tegnet gjentas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: One <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event is generated upon release.
trans-unit.target: Én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>hendelse genereres etter frigivelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: With each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event, a KeyPressEventArgs is passed.
trans-unit.target: Med hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>hendelse, sendes en KeyPressEventArgs.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> is passed with each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>er sendt med hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> specifies whether any modifier keys (CTRL, SHIFT, or ALT) were pressed along with another key.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>angir om noen modifikator-nøkler (CTRL, SKIFT eller ALT) trykker sammen med en annen nøkkel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: (This modifier information can also be obtained through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.) Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event.
trans-unit.target: (Denne modifikatoren kan også hentes via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klasse.)</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A> Angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>til `true` å avbryte den `KeyPress` hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This keeps the control from processing the key press.
trans-unit.target: Dette hindrer at kontrollen behandling key trykk.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some controls will process certain key strokes on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen kontroller behandler enkelte key streker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> processes the Enter key before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> is called.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>behandler nøkkelen angi før <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>kalles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: In such cases, you cannot cancel the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event, and must cancel the key stroke from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> instead.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke avbryte i slike tilfeller i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>hendelse, og må avbryte key strek fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hendelsen modellen, kan du se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the current state of the modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å hente gjeldende status for nøklene modifikator.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ASCII character corresponding to the key the user pressed.
trans-unit.target: ASCII-tegn som tilsvarer nøkkelen brukeren trykket.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref> event was handled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"> </xref> hendelsen ble behandlet.

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, it will be sent to the operating system for default processing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hendelsen ikke behandles, sendes til operativsystemet for standard behandling.

trans-unit.source: Set Handled to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event.
trans-unit.target: WantDestinationQueue Handled `true` å avbryte den `KeyPress` hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hendelsen behandles; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character corresponding to the key pressed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tegn som tilsvarer tasten nede.

trans-unit.source: Use the KeyChar property to sample keystrokes at run time and to modify keystrokes under special run-time circumstances.
trans-unit.target: Bruk KeyChar-egenskapen til eksemplet tastetrykk ved kjøretid og endre tastetrykk i spesielle kjøretid tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use KeyChar to disable non-numeric keypresses when the user enters a ZIP code, change all alphabetical keypresses to uppercase in a data entry field, or monitor the keyboard or other key input device for specific key combinations.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke KeyChar til å deaktivere ikke-numeriske tastetrykk når brukeren skriver inn et postnummer, endre alle alfabetisk tastetrykk store bokstaver i en oppføringsfelt eller overvåke tastaturet eller annen nøkkel inndata enhet for bestemte key kombinasjoner.

trans-unit.source: You can get or set the following keys: - a-z, A-Z.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente eller angi følgende nøkler: – a-z, A-Z.

trans-unit.source: - CTRL.
trans-unit.target: -CTRL.

trans-unit.source: - Punctuation marks.
trans-unit.target: -Skilletegn.

trans-unit.source: - Number keys, both across the top of the keyboard and on the numeric keypad.
trans-unit.target: -Number nøkler, både øverst på tastaturet og numeriske tastaturet.

trans-unit.source: - ENTER.
trans-unit.target: -ANGI.

trans-unit.source: You cannot get or set the following keys: - The TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke hente eller angi følgende nøkler:-i kategorien nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: - INSERT and DELETE.
trans-unit.target: -INSERT-, og Slett.

trans-unit.source: - HOME.
trans-unit.target: -HOME.

trans-unit.source: - END.
trans-unit.target: -END.

trans-unit.source: - PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN.
trans-unit.target: -SIDE opp og side ned.
F1 F2.

trans-unit.source: - ALT.
trans-unit.target: -ALT.

trans-unit.source: - Arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: -Piltaster.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For information about how to detect any of the non-character keys mentioned above, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For informasjon om hvordan registrere noen av nøklene ikke tegn ovenfor, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The ASCII character that is composed.
trans-unit.target: ASCII-tegn som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user presses SHIFT + K, this property returns an uppercase K.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis brukeren trykker SKIFT + K, returnerer dette et store kB.
